attributes.action: To remove prince Charles as air to the throne of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prince charles should not become king England because we all now that when he become's king. Camila becomes the new Queen of England and I dont think this should be alowed to happen. Prince william should be the air to the throne instead of charles

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
